data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, parie gima osetimorenwa;
Girkeni mawa osemi jopinje mamoko,
Wasedongʼ kiye,
Nyaka wangʼiew pi mawamodho;
Jogo malawowa nikodwa machiegni;
Ne wachiwore ni Misri kod Asuria
Kwerewa notimo richo, to koro gionge,
Wasumbini ema tinde otelonwa,
Wayudo chiembwa e yo matek manyalo hinyo ngimawa
Dendwa owre mana ka mach
Mon osemak githuon e Sayun,
Jodong gwengʼ oselier gi lwetegi e yien,
Jomatindo tiyo matek kuonde mag rego,
Jodongo onge e dhoranga dala maduongʼ;
Mor oserumo e chunywa;
Osimbo mar duongʼ oselwar oa e wiwa.
Nikech gik ma osetimorenwagi,
nimar got Sayun, osejwangʼ modongʼ gunda
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, lochni osiko manyaka chiengʼ
Ere gima omiyo wiyi wil kodwa kinde duto?
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, dwogwa iri;
Ka ok itimonwa kamano, to nyiso ni isedagiwa
